com.haojie.others

类 UploadPhotoInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.haojie.others.UploadPhotoInfo

  • public class UploadPhotoInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    The object that encapsulates all the uploaded info about an image to be uploaded.
